<div class="pilwrap" id="2.1.12-jun-27-2022">
  <h2>
    <a href="#2.1.12-jun-27-2022" name="2.1.12-jun-27-2022" class="pilcrow"></a>
2.1.12 (Jun 27, 2022)
  </h2>
</div>
<div class="pilwrap" id="fix-5">
  <h3>
    <a href="#fix-5" name="fix-5" class="pilcrow"></a>
fix
  </h3>
</div>
<ul>
<li>update react-smooth version</li>
<li>update d3 from 6.x to 7.x it may break some tools like jest</li>
</ul>
<p>fix config for jest is to add the following configuration</p>
<pre><code class="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> path = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'path'</span>);
<span class="hljs-comment">// took from d3/package.json</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> d3Pkgs = [
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-array'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-axis'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-brush'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-chord'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-color'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-contour'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-delaunay'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-dispatch'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-drag'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-dsv'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-ease'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-fetch'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-force'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-format'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-geo'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-hierarchy'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-interpolate'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-path'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-polygon'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-quadtree'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-random'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-scale'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-scale-chromatic'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-selection'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-shape'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-time'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-time-format'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-timer'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-transition'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-string">'d3-zoom'</span>,
];

<span class="hljs-comment">// option 1 map module to an bundled version of the package which is es5</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> moduleNameMapper = d3Pkgs.reduce(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">acc, pkg</span>) =&gt;</span> {
  acc[<span class="hljs-string">`^<span class="hljs-subst">${pkg}</span>$`</span>] = path.join(<span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>.resolve(pkg), <span class="hljs-string">`../../dist/<span class="hljs-subst">${pkg}</span>.min.js`</span>);
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> acc;
}, {});

<span class="hljs-built_in">module</span>.exports = {
  <span class="hljs-attr">moduleNameMapper</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-comment">// option 1</span>
    <span class="hljs-comment">// ...moduleNameMapper</span>
  },
  <span class="hljs-attr">transform</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-comment">// match mjs js jsx ts tsx</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">'^.+\\.m?[jt]sx?$'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'babel-jest'</span>,
  },
  <span class="hljs-comment">// stop ignore node_modules transform since d3 and others start to put es6 as main of packages</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">transformIgnorePatterns</span>: [
    <span class="hljs-comment">// option 2, stop ignore transform on es6 packages</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">`/node_modules/(?!<span class="hljs-subst">${d3Pkgs.join(<span class="hljs-string">'|'</span>)}</span>|internmap|d3-delaunay|delaunator|robust-predicates)`</span>,
    <span class="hljs-comment">// option 3, stop ignore transform on all node_modules</span>
    <span class="hljs-comment">// `/node_modules/(?!.*)`,</span>
  ],
};
</code></pre>
